name: TEL chapter one
description: TEL is a visual novel-esque rpg where you play through multiple stories and see the world through multiple people. TEL Chapter One follows the story of Marcus a young man who, after the death of his mother, was burdened with caring for his sick younger sister. One day when coming home from work Marcus was targeted by a strange group of people claiming they need his body to become the vessel for their dying god. After an encounter that left him wounded he ended up in a hospital like prison run by a mad doctor. Will Marcus be able to escape and return home?
